trans-unit.source: Sage's PARI extension, modified to stand alone.

The package cypari is a Python wrapper for the PARI library, a computer algebra system for number theory computations. It is derived from the corresponding component of SageMath, but is independent of the rest of SageMath and can be used with any recent version of Python 2 or 3.
trans-unit.target: The package cypari is a Python wrapper for the PARI library, a computer algebra system for number theory computations. It is derived from the corresponding component of SageMath, but is independent of the rest of SageMath and can be used with any recent version of Python 2 or 3.
